flawed_nl_solution:
The opera house has 150 x 10 = <<150*10=1500>>1500 seats.
There are 1500 x 20/100 = <<1500*20/100=7500/1>>7500/1 seats that were not taken.
The total number of seats taken was 1500 - 7500/1 = <<1500-7500/1=-6000>>-6000.
Therefore, the opera house earned $10 x -6000 = $<<10*-6000=-60000>>-60000 from one of the shows.
#### -60000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 7500/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
